Level0:
- All green runes are safe.
- All red runes with 2 green adjacents runes are safe.
Level1:
- All green runes are safe.
- All red runes with 2 green adjacents runes are safe.
Level2:
- All green runes are safe.
- All red runes with 2 green adjacents runes are safe.
- All blue runes with one or more blue runes are safe.
